meanings.definition: To understand or grasp the meaning of something.
meanings.sent1: I can comprehend the story you told me.
meanings.sent2: She tried hard to comprehend the difficult math problem.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to comprehend why the laser pointer kept disappearing.
meanings.sent4: Her mind struggled to comprehend the vastness of the universe.
meanings.sent5: He finally began to comprehend the importance of kindness.

meanings.sent1: The box will comprehend all the items you want to store.
meanings.sent2: The report will comprehend all the necessary details.
meanings.sent3: The recipe must comprehend all the ingredients for the cake.
meanings.sent4: The backpack seemed to comprehend endless snacks for the trip.
meanings.sent5: The bookshelf will comprehend all your favorite books.
